title: Mr Reporter
author: Mr Reporter
content: See the TikTok video: https://www.tiktok.com/@shugadaddii_/video/7264604065781402885See it on legit.ng: https://www.legit.ng/people/1548598-man-travels-delta-machine-give-8-daily/The other guy is from Delta and went to Abuja after he knows about that guy we talked about: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462031.msg62644892#msg62644892Is mining profitable in Nigeria? That is Abuja. Where to buy ASICs from in Nigeria? Or they are making TikTok to go viral and earn money with it.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on August 13, 2023, 12:11:42 PMSee the TikTok video: https://www.tiktok.com/@shugadaddii_/video/7264604065781402885See it on legit.ng: https://www.legit.ng/people/1548598-man-travels-delta-machine-give-8-daily/The other guy is from Delta and went to Abuja after he knows about that guy we talked about: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462031.msg62644892#msg62644892Is mining profitable in Nigeria? That is Abuja. Where to buy ASICs from in Nigeria? Or they are making TikTok to go viral and earn money with it.If no be money wey dey yap man weytin be mining machine wey i no go fit get for my house but another thing be say light for most side of port harcourt city na shege, YOU GO EXPLAIN EXPLAIN EXPLAIN TIRE NO EVIDENCE     man get plans for life like this but money and some circumstances ehh na the wahala we dey face.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on August 13, 2023, 12:11:42 PMIs mining profitable in Nigeria? That is Abuja. Where to buy ASICs from in Nigeria? Or they are making TikTok to go viral and earn money with it.To buy ASICs no suppose hard for this country nah as many online stores them they run nation wide delivery nah just for you to locate am for the shop, order am pay on delivery or online if you trust the online shopping center way u wan use. Then about the cost, Nah people way they go into am sabi watin them they benefit abi make i say watin them expect to benefit, as we discuss for ur old thread, some place for the country get higher cost for electricity and if something like minining they set up for that kind area me i doubt if the person fit earn any thing useful from am, unless say them get other means to carry access power supply way go cost them less. The thing about them too try to make dre video go viral, People dy do anything way dem feel fee say fit give them firm and popularity for d social media, bcuz the more people they follow and watch ur video the more likely u fit they qualified to earn from the videos way u go they post. so any one way be the OP objective I just pray make eh work for am, everything way we they struggle for nah to feed our belle eh no too far from their.

Then about the cost, Nah people way they go into am sabi watin them they benefit abi make i say watin them expect to benefit, as we discuss for ur old thread, some place for the country get higher cost for electricity and if something like minining they set up for that kind area me i doubt if the person fit earn any thing useful from am, unless say them get other means to carry access power supply way go cost them less. The thing about them too try to make dre video go viral, People dy do anything way dem feel fee say fit give them firm and popularity for d social media, bcuz the more people they follow and watch ur video the more likely u fit they qualified to earn from the videos way u go they post. so any one way be the OP objective I just pray make eh work for am, everything way we they struggle for nah to feed our belle eh no too far from their. For me I think say this mining issue for here na solely because of the electricity problem but like you said even if person set this mining farm or solo mining the cost of electricity tariff go be him major issue to actually acquire profit for him Bitcoin mining but not withstanding Bitcoin mining can be still be done with solar power so finding solar na another option.Omo no be small my brother this country everyone just want find their belle. @ YouTubers

For me I think say this mining issue for here na solely because of the electricity problem but like you said even if person set this mining farm or solo mining the cost of electricity tariff go be him major issue to actually acquire profit for him Bitcoin mining but not withstanding Bitcoin mining can be still be done with solar power so finding solar na another option.Omo no be small my brother this country everyone just want find their belle. @ YouTubers Yes my brother this electricity nah the major issues way we the citizens of 9ja they get and this matter come make people come dey use fuel well well and now the fuel don cost join so my brother e go better say anybody way won submite him self to this bitcoin mining go must buy solar energy way go carry all the systems way en go use do en mining work if the minner no use this solar energy way him con dey depend on nepa light chai that miner go dey very very fostrated, because wating nepa go do am ehh en eye no go believe am and e go get big loss.Again as this country self dey bad the Solar energy self con dey cost join so anybody way no balance some how no go fit buy am, people like the common men e go dey hard unless person go go borrow money buy am use do em mining work.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: First, generally, bitcoin mining in Nigeria is a very good topic for us to discuss, just as the influencer in the video said, Bitcoin mining is a very hot topic here in Nigeria and that is because there have not been any known operational mining farms here in Nigeria I don't know of any other African country if there is any mining farm running effectively.One of the major challenges that is always pointed at is the lack of electricity supply and in solving that we have to look for.1: suitable location for bitcoin mining in Nigeria, where there is constant electricity and good environmental condition.2: high taxation and police brutality since Bitcoin is not yet legal in Nigeria.I believe that why the guy in the video choose Abuja is because of the electricity supply, because here in Abuja we still have stable electricity compared to other parts of the country, and also the weather conditions in Abuja also have good weather compared also to other states and may compete with Abuja in available electricity supply.You may be right that the video may have been acted since every YouTuber is looking for and trending topic to act their line on, to get the like and comment, follower so there is the possibility that the video may have been acted accordingly, from the name of the company (Shuga daddy mining) sound like a Ponzi scheme and that raised my suspicious higher in the authenticity of the video.

comments.author: promise444c5
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on August 13, 2023, 12:11:42 PMIs mining profitable in Nigeria? That is Abuja. Where to buy ASICs from in Nigeria? Or they are making TikTok to go viral and earn money with it.Seriously have checked many a lot of post on this minning stuff but with most response have seen  minning now Is much  more hard . Imagine competing with the hash rate now is something else talk more of the country you are setting up your  miner the cost of maintenance  buying coolers because it get hot, Electricity and more .   I'm also obsessed about this minning of a thing though I knew little about it before but I get a lot more exposed here . It's  not advisable though but if you want to compete with what's out there you need the Recent ASIC MINER ranging from $38k above not to mention about the cost of maintenance. Even with the recent as have said the hash rate has increased so it takes a lot of effort . Besides,  next year Is the next halving so there's high probability  the hash rate increases drastically  as the amount of Bitcoin remaining to be mined will be reduced
